languages.text: {n}Завороженная, Идира слушает ваш голос и безвольно повторяет за вами:{/n} "Ведь шепоты — это я, а я — это шепоты... Наверное, я и правда могу еще пожить с этим даром... если он такой ценный... да?" {n}Лоб женщины морщится от терзающих ее противоречий.{/n} "Ценный, но опасный, {name}. Шепотки не только помогают мне. Они меня манят, манят к чему-то... непоправимому".

traits.locale_text: {n}Словно завороженная, Идира слушает ваш голос и безвольно повторяет за вами:{/n} "Ведь шепоты — это я, а я — это шепоты... Наверное, я и правда могу еще пожить с этим даром... если он такой ценный... да?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Spellbound, Idira listens to the sound of your voice and weakly repeats after you,{/n} "Because the whispers are who I am, and I am the whispers... Yes, I could live a bit longer with this... incredible gift... because it's so great... right?" {n}Her brow furrows as she wrestles with her doubts.{/n} "As great as it is, it's also dangerous, {name}. The whispers don't just help me. They are luring me to something... irreversible."

Шепотки не только помогают мне. Они меня манят, манят к чему-то... непоправимому".

languages.text: {n}呪文にかかったイディラは、あなたの声に耳を傾け、弱々しく繰り返す。{/n}「その囁きこそが私、私こそが囁き…そう、この驚くべき力で…私はもう少し生き永らえられる…だって、これはとても素晴らしいから…そうでしょう？」{n}彼女は己の疑念とせめぎ合い、眉をひそめる。{/n}「それは素晴らしいことであると同時にとても危険だわ、{name}。囁きは私を助けてくれるだけじゃない。彼らは私を…何か不可逆なものへと誘う」
languages.original_text: {n}Spellbound, Idira listens to the sound of your voice and weakly repeats after you,{/n} "Because the whispers are who I am, and I am the whispers... Yes, I could live a bit longer with this... incredible gift... because it's so great... right?" {n}Her brow furrows as she wrestles with her doubts.{/n} "As great as it is, it's also dangerous, {name}. The whispers don't just help me. They are luring me to something... irreversible."

traits.locale_text: {n}呪文にかかったイディラは、あなたの声に耳を傾け、弱々しく繰り返す。{/n}「その囁きこそが私、私こそが囁き…そう、この驚くべき力で…私はもう少し生き永らえられる…だって、これはとても素晴らしいから…そうでしょう？」{n}彼女は己の疑念とせめぎ合い、眉をひそめる。{/n}「それは素晴らしいことであると同時にとても危険だわ、{name}。囁きは私を助けてくれるだけじゃない。彼らは私を…何か不可逆なものへと誘う」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉仿佛着魔一般聆听着你的话语，以虚弱的声音重复着。{/n}“因为低语就是我，我就是低语本身……没错，有了这件难以置信的礼物……我应该可以活得久一点了……因为这份礼物实在是太棒了……是吧？”{n}她眉头紧锁，似乎在与心中的疑虑作斗争。{/n}“尽管这件礼物很棒，但也很危险，{name}。那些低语并不是白白帮忙，它们也在引诱我……踏上无法挽回的道路。”
languages.original_text: {n}Spellbound, Idira listens to the sound of your voice and weakly repeats after you,{/n} "Because the whispers are who I am, and I am the whispers... Yes, I could live a bit longer with this... incredible gift... because it's so great... right?" {n}Her brow furrows as she wrestles with her doubts.{/n} "As great as it is, it's also dangerous, {name}. The whispers don't just help me. They are luring me to something... irreversible."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉仿佛着魔一般聆听着你的话语，以虚弱的声音重复着。{/n}“因为低语就是我，我就是低语本身……没错，有了这件难以置信的礼物……我应该可以活得久一点了……因为这份礼物实在是太棒了……是吧？”{n}她眉头紧锁，似乎在与心中的疑虑作斗争。{/n}“尽管这件礼物很棒，但也很危险，{name}。那些低语并不是白白帮忙，它们也在引诱我……踏上无法挽回的道路。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cautivada, Idira escucha tu voz y se hace eco de tus palabras:{/n} «Porque los susurros son parte de mí, y yo soy parte de ellos... Sí, podría vivir un poco más con este... increíble don... porque es fantástico... ¿verdad?». {n}Su ceño se frunce por las dudas.{/n} «Pero, por fantástico que sea, también es peligroso, {name}. Y los susurros no solo me ayudan. Me guían hacia algo... irreversible».
languages.original_text: {n}Spellbound, Idira listens to the sound of your voice and weakly repeats after you,{/n} "Because the whispers are who I am, and I am the whispers... Yes, I could live a bit longer with this... incredible gift... because it's so great... right?" {n}Her brow furrows as she wrestles with her doubts.{/n} "As great as it is, it's also dangerous, {name}. The whispers don't just help me. They are luring me to something... irreversible."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cautivada, Idira escucha tu voz y se hace eco de tus palabras:{/n} «Porque los susurros son parte de mí, y yo soy parte de ellos... Sí, podría vivir un poco más con este... increíble don... porque es fantástico... ¿verdad?». {n}Su ceño se frunce por las dudas.{/n} «Pero, por fantástico que sea, también es peligroso, {name}. Y los susurros no solo me ayudan. Me guían hacia algo... irreversible».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Fasziniert lauscht Idira dem Klang deiner Stimme und wiederholt:{/n} "Weil die Flüsterer ich sind und ich die Flüsterer bin ... Ja, ich könnte noch eine Weile länger mit dieser ... unglaublichen Gabe ... leben ... weil sie ja so wunderbar ist ... nicht wahr?" {n}Sie runzelt die Stirn, während sie mit ihren Zweifeln ringt.{/n} "So groß es ist, es ist auch gefährlich, {name}. Das Flüstern hilft mir nicht nur. Es lockt mich zu etwas ... Unumkehrbarem."
languages.original_text: {n}Spellbound, Idira listens to the sound of your voice and weakly repeats after you,{/n} "Because the whispers are who I am, and I am the whispers... Yes, I could live a bit longer with this... incredible gift... because it's so great... right?" {n}Her brow furrows as she wrestles with her doubts.{/n} "As great as it is, it's also dangerous, {name}. The whispers don't just help me. They are luring me to something... irreversible."

traits.locale_text: {n}Fasziniert lauscht Idira dem Klang deiner Stimme und wiederholt leise:{/n} "Weil die Flüsterer ich sind und ich die Flüsterer bin ... Ja, ich könnte noch eine Weile länger mit dieser ... unglaublichen Gabe ... leben ... weil sie ja so wunderbar ist ... nicht wahr?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Comme envoûtée par vos paroles, Idira répète faiblement après vous :{/n} « Les murmures font partie de moi, et je suis les murmures... Oui, je pourrais vivre encore un peu avec cet... incroyable don... parce qu'il est génial... c'est ça ? » {n}En proie au doute, elle fronce les sourcils.{/n} « Génial ou pas, il reste extrêmement dangereux, {name}. Les murmures ne se contentent pas de m'aider. Ils m'attirent vers quelque chose... d'irréversible. »
languages.original_text: {n}Spellbound, Idira listens to the sound of your voice and weakly repeats after you,{/n} "Because the whispers are who I am, and I am the whispers... Yes, I could live a bit longer with this... incredible gift... because it's so great... right?" {n}Her brow furrows as she wrestles with her doubts.{/n} "As great as it is, it's also dangerous, {name}. The whispers don't just help me. They are luring me to something... irreversible."

traits.locale_text: {n}Comme envoûtée par vos paroles, Idira répète faiblement après vous :{/n} « Les murmures font partie de moi, et je suis les murmures... Oui, je pourrais vivre encore un peu avec cet... incroyable don... parce qu'il est génial... c'est ça ? » {n}En proie au doute, elle fronce les sourcils.{/n} « Génial ou pas, il reste extrêmement dangereux, {name}. Les murmures ne se contentent pas de m'aider. Ils m'attirent vers quelque chose... d'irréversible. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Büyüye kapılan İdira, sesini dinleyip takatsizce tekrar ediyor.{/n} "Çünkü fısıltılar beni ben yapıyor, bense fısıltıları... Evet, bu olağanüstü lütufla... Biraz daha yaşayabilirim... Çünkü bu müthiş bir şey... Değil mi?" {n}İdira, şüpheleriyle boğuşurken kaşlarını çatıyor.{/n} "Müthiş olmasına müthiş ama aynı zamanda tehlikeli de {name}. Fısıltılar bana sadece yardım etmiyor. Beni geri dönüşü olmayan bir yola sürüklüyorlar..."
languages.original_text: {n}Spellbound, Idira listens to the sound of your voice and weakly repeats after you,{/n} "Because the whispers are who I am, and I am the whispers... Yes, I could live a bit longer with this... incredible gift... because it's so great... right?" {n}Her brow furrows as she wrestles with her doubts.{/n} "As great as it is, it's also dangerous, {name}. The whispers don't just help me. They are luring me to something... irreversible."

traits.locale_text: {n}Büyüye kapılan İdira, sesini dinleyip takatsizce tekrar ediyor.{/n} "Çünkü fısıltılar beni ben yapıyor, bense fısıltıları... Evet, bu olağanüstü lütufla... Biraz daha yaşayabilirim... Çünkü bu müthiş bir şey... Değil mi?" {n}İdira şüpheleriyle boğuşurken kaşlarını çatıyor.{/n} "Müthiş olmasına müthiş ama aynı zamanda tehlikeli de {name}. Fısıltılar bana sadece yardım etmiyor. Beni ayrıca geri dönüşü olmayan bir yola da sürüklüyorlar..."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
